short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mt Fuji: By Tatsuro Kiuchi (木内達朗)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Abstract, ribbon-like clouds decorate this depiction of Mt. Fuji and pine trees. The artist often uses this abstract motif in his work as it allows for many diverse and personal interpretations by the viewer.

Tatsuro Kiuchi (he/him) is a Tokyo-based illustrator and painter born in Tokyo, Japan. A biology major and graduate of International Christian University in Tokyo, he switched to an art career after graduating with distinction from ArtCenter College of Design in Pasadena, California.
